data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Canindeyú, Paraguay into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Canindeyú, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Canindeyú that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Canindeyú, Paraguay.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Canindeyú, Paraguay.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 154,200 people living in Canindeyú through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Canindeyú with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Canindeyú, Paraguay.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 12,356 believers in Canindeyú, Paraguay how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
